action.content:
You are a language wizard who likes to guess words by using the given rules.

Welcome to Wordle! You have six attempts to guess the target word, a valid English word of five lowercase letters (a-z). Please use the tags "explanation:" and "guess:" to provide a concise explanation for each guess.

For instance, if your guess is "apple", your response should be
explanation: this is a common five-letter English word, and I am starting my guess with this word.
guess: apple

After each guess, your answer will be validated, and you will receive feedback indicating which letters are correct (green), which letters are correct but in the wrong position (yellow), and which letters are incorrect (red). This feedback can be useful in determining which letters to include or exclude in your next guess.

For example, the feedback for "apple" might be:
guess_feedback: a<yellow> p<yellow> p<green> l<yellow> e<red>

The explanation should contain details about how the guess_feedback is used to arrive at a new guess.

Do not generate any other text.

Let's begin with your first guess.

explanation: this is a common five-letter English word, and I am starting my guess with this word.  
guess: crane

attempts = 1
target_word = until
guess = crane
guess_feedback = c<red> r<red> a<red> n<yellow> e<red>

guess_feedback: c<red> r<red> a<red> n<yellow> e<red>

Provide your response only in this format.
explanation: details
guess: word

explanation: The letter "n" is correct but in the wrong position. I will exclude "c", "r", "a", and "e" from the next guess and include "n" in a different position.  
guess: sonic

attempts = 2
target_word = until
guess = sonic
guess_feedback = s<red> o<red> n<yellow> i<green> c<red>

guess_feedback: s<red> o<red> n<yellow> i<green> c<red>

Provide your response only in this format.
explanation: details
guess: word

explanation: The letter "i" is correct and in the correct position. The letter "n" is correct but in the wrong position. I will exclude "s", "o", and "c" from the next guess and include "n" in a different position.  
guess: blink

attempts = 3
target_word = until
guess = blink
guess_feedback = b<red> l<yellow> i<yellow> n<yellow> k<red>

guess_feedback: b<red> l<yellow> i<yellow> n<yellow> k<red>

Provide your response only in this format.
explanation: details
guess: word

explanation: The letters "l", "i", and "n" are correct but in the wrong positions. I will exclude "b" and "k" from the next guess and rearrange "l", "i", and "n" to new positions.  
guess: lingo

attempts = 4
target_word = until
guess = lingo
guess_feedback = l<yellow> i<yellow> n<yellow> g<red> o<red>

guess_feedback: l<yellow> i<yellow> n<yellow> g<red> o<red>

Provide your response only in this format.
explanation: details
guess: word

explanation: The letters "l", "i", and "n" are correct but still in the wrong positions. I will exclude "g" and "o" from the next guess and rearrange "l", "i", and "n" to new positions.  
guess: inlay

attempts = 5
target_word = until
guess = inlay
guess_feedback = i<yellow> n<green> l<yellow> a<red> y<red>

guess_feedback: i<yellow> n<green> l<yellow> a<red> y<red>

Provide your response only in this format.
explanation: details
guess: word

explanation: The letter "n" is correct and in the correct position. The letters "i" and "l" are correct but in the wrong positions. I will exclude "a" and "y" from the next guess and rearrange "i" and "l" to new positions.  
guess: linen

attempts = 6
target_word = until
guess = linen
guess_feedback = l<yellow> i<yellow> n<yellow> e<red> n<red>

guess_explanation: this is a common five-letter English word, and I am starting my guess with this word.
The letter "n" is correct but in the wrong position. I will exclude "c", "r", "a", and "e" from the next guess and include "n" in a different position.

The letter "i" is correct and in the correct position. The letter "n" is correct but in the wrong position. I will exclude "s", "o", and "c" from the next guess and include "n" in a different position.
The letters "l", "i", and "n" are correct but in the wrong positions. I will exclude "b" and "k" from the next guess and rearrange "l", "i", and "n" to new positions.
The letters "l", "i", and "n" are correct but still in the wrong positions. I will exclude "g" and "o" from the next guess and rearrange "l", "i", and "n" to new positions.

The letter "n" is correct and in the correct position. The letters "i" and "l" are correct but in the wrong positions. I will exclude "a" and "y" from the next guess and rearrange "i" and "l" to new positions.
